summary: Improves the looks and skills of Annekke Crag-Jumper. Includes special Bounder Edition!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][b][i][color=#ffff00]Skyrim SE version now [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3004]available[/url][/color][/i]
[/b]

[u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
Modifies [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Annekke_Crag-Jumper]Annekke Crag-Jumper[/url] in Darkwater Crossing, who can become your follower. This mod attempts to maintain Annekke's original theme of being an experienced explorer and Combat Ranger class, while improving her appearance, skills and survivability.

Annekke is a wisp of a lass (weight = 20). So in this mod, Annekke relies on her speed, stealth, deftness and decisive attacks to win her battles. That is, she has improved speed, quickened attacks, and relies heavily on crit damage perks. She is thus capable, but not a tank.

This is actually two mods in one ([i]only install one or the other[/i]!):
[list]
[*]Standard Edition - hair style and makeup changes only to alter her appearance. Added perks and tweaks to improve her abilities as a follower.
[*]Bounder Edition - warpaint added and other slight appearance changes. This edition adds stronger perks and tweaks than the Standard Edition.
[/list]
[size=2](In case you are unaware of it, "Bounder Edition" derives from [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Verner_Rock-Chucker]Annekke's husband's[/url] characterization of her.)[/size]


[size=4][b][color=red]IMPORTANT!! SEE INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS BELOW!![/color][/b][/size]


[size=4][b][u]Features[/u][/b][/size]
[i][size=2]
Differences for the [b]Bounder Edition[/b] are shown in parentheses[/size][/i]

[list]
[*]Marked Essential.
[*]Does not affect stealth meter.
[*]Female gender stance.
[*]Levels with the player from 6 to 100.
[*]Retains the CombatRanger class.
[*]Has a custom combat style.
[*]Skilled in one-handed blades and axes, but not maces.
[*]Perked in her particular skillsets:
[*]  1H: Armsman40(60), Bladesman90, HackandSlash90, FightingStance, SavageStrike, CriticalCharge
[*]  Light Armor:AgileDefender40(60), Unhindered, WindWalker, DeftMovement
[*]  Archery: OverDraw20(40), CriticalShot90, Ranger
[*]  Block: ShieldWall60(80), ElementalProtection, DeflectArrows, Powerbashperk, BlockRunner
[*]  Sneak: Stealth40(60),Lightfoot,MuffledMovement
[*]  Special quickness perk: all weapon attacks +30% faster (essentially, the QuickShot perk but for all weapons)
[*]Base Stat boosts: Health +50 (+100), Stamina +50, Run speed +30
[*]Confidence: Brave (Foolhardy)
[*]Crimes: Violence against Enemies (Any crime)
[*]Reviewed with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url].
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Requirements[/u][/b][/size]
Skyrim

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
If you are starting a new game, or Annekke is not yet your follower:
[list]
[*]Download with NMM.
[*]Activate in NMM.
[/list]
These steps [i]may [/i]be necessary for an existing game where Annekke is already your follower - [color=red]IMPORTANT[/color]:
[list]
[*]Download with NMM.
[*]If Annekke is currently a follower of yours, dismiss her as a follower.
[*]Create a savegame.
[*]Exit game and activate mod in NMM.
[*]Load the savegame.
[*]Go to Annekke (she may still be wearing the steel armor) and have her follow you.
[*]Trade with Annekke and take EVERYTHING from her inventory.
[*]Dismiss her as a follower.
[*]Open the console (tilde key) and click on Annekke. You should see her Form ID number appear.
[*]Type: [b]disable[/b] (this will cause Annekke to disappear - that's ok)
[*]Type: [b]enable[/b]
[*]Type: [b]setlevel 1000 0 6 100[/b]
[*]Exit the console (tilde key)
[*]Annekke should now reappear and her stats should be correct (you can check with UFO)
[*]Make her a follower again and give her back her equipment.
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Dismiss the follower.
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Usage[/u][/b][/size]
Do not upload this mod elsewhere, but feel free to use anything in it for your own mod.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
Load after UFO or any other mod which modifies Annekke.
Uses only vanilla assets.
Recommended mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19903]Follower Trade Priority[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18794/?]Challenging AI - Aggressive Combat Styles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2700/?]Duel - Combat Realism[/url]

[size=4][b][u]Mods used in screenshots[/u][/b][/size]
I like a generally minimalistic approach to character visual changes. These are the mods I use which affect female appearance:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-friendly Hair - HD Textures[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better Females By Bella[/url] (version: No makeup just improved textures)
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
[/list]


[size=4][b][u]My Mods[/u]
[b][list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1#]Skyrim Special Edition[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Skyrim[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/manage/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Oblivion[/url]
[/list][/b]
[/b][/size]
author: LazyAltmer
